display_name: Modified Horne Ostberg Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire Score
description:
Calculated - Summary score derived based on modified Horne-Ostberg Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire. [Horne JA and Ostberg O, 1976 (PubMed ID: 1027738)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1027738)

[Search for all HOMEQ variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/wsc/variables?search=homeq)
